verses.verse: You shall not raise <S%H5375><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> report <S%H8088><s%>: put <S%H7896><s%> not your hand <S%H3027><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to be an unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%>.

You shall not follow <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> to do evil <S%H7451><s%>; neither shall you speak <S%H6030><s%> in a cause <S%H7379><s%> to decline <S%H5186><s%> after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> to bend judgment <S%H5186><s%>:
Neither shall you favor <S%H1921><s%> a poor <S%H1800><s%> man in his cause <S%H7379><s%>.

If you meet <S%H6293><s%> your enemy <S%H341><s%>'s ox <S%H7794><s%> or his donkey <S%H2543><s%> going astray <S%H8582><s%>, you shall surely <S%H7725><s%> bring it back <S%H7725><s%> to him again <S%H7725><s%>.

If you see <S%H7200><s%> the donkey <S%H2543><s%> of him that hates <S%H8130><s%> you lying <S%H7257><s%> under his burden <S%H4853><s%>, and would not want <S%H2308><s%> to help <S%H5800><s%> him <S%H5800><s%>, you shall surely help with him <S%H5800><s%>.
You shall not bend <S%H5186><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of your poor <S%H34><s%> in his cause <S%H7379><s%>.

Keep you far <S%H7368><s%> from a false <S%H8267><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%>; and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> and righteous <S%H6662><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> you not <S%H6663><s%>: for I will not justify the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> no gift <S%H7810><s%>: for the gift <S%H7810><s%> blinds <S%H5786><s%> the wise <S%H6493><s%>, and perverts <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

Also you shall not oppress <S%H3905><s%> a stranger <S%H1616><s%>: for you know <S%H3045><s%> the heart <S%H5315><s%> of a stranger <S%H1616><s%>, seeing <S%H3588><s%> you were strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your land <S%H776><s%>, and shall gather <S%H622><s%> in the fruits there <S%H8393><s%>.

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year you shall let it rest <S%H8058><s%> and lie <S%H5203><s%> still <S%H34><s%>; that the poor of your people <S%H5971><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%>: and what they leave <S%H3499><s%> the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%>. In like manner you shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with your vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and with your oliveyard <S%H2132><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> your work <S%H4639><s%>, and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest <S%H7673><s%>: that your ox <S%H7794><s%> and your donkey <S%H2543><s%> may rest <S%H5117><s%>, and the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid <S%H519><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, may be refreshed <S%H5314><s%>.

And in all things that I have said <S%H559><s%> unto you be circumspect <S%H8104><s%>: and make no mention <S%H2142><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, neither let it be heard <S%H8085><s%> out <S%H5921><s%> of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%> you shall keep a feast <S%H2287><s%> unto me in the year <S%H8141><s%>.

You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>: you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you in the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%>; for in it you came out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and none shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty <S%H7387><s%>:)

And the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>, the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of your labors <S%H4639><s%>, which you hast sown <S%H2232><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of ingathering <S%H614><s%>, which is in the end <S%H3318><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>, when you hast gathered <S%H622><s%> in your labors <S%H4639><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> all your males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> God <S%H3068><s%>.

You shall not offer <S%H2076><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened bread <S%H2557><s%>; neither shall the fat <S%H2459><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>. you shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk <S%H2461><s%>.

Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I send an Angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to keep <S%H8104><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and to bring <S%H935><s%> you into the place <S%H4725><s%> which I have prepared <S%H3559><s%>.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H8085><s%>, and obey his voice <S%H6963><s%>, provoke <S%H4843><s%> him not <S%H5375><s%>; for he will not pardon your transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: for my name <S%H8034><s%> is in him <S%H7130><s%>.

But if you shall indeed <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all that I speak <S%H1696><s%>; then I will be an enemy <S%H340><s%> unto your enemies <S%H341><s%>, and an adversary <S%H6887><s%> unto your adversaries <S%H6696><s%>.

For my Angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and bring <S%H935><s%> you in unto the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>: and I will cut them off <S%H3582><s%>.

You shall not bow down <S%H7812><s%> to their gods <S%H430><s%>, nor serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, nor do after their works <S%H4639><s%>: but you shall utterly <S%H2040><s%> overthrow <S%H2040><s%> them <S%H7665><s%>, and quite break down <S%H7665><s%> their images <S%H4676><s%>.

And you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%>, and your water <S%H4325><s%>; and I will take <S%H5493><s%> sickness <S%H4245><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from the midst of you <S%H7130><s%>.
There shall nothing cast their young <S%H7921><s%>, nor be childless <S%H6135><s%>, in your land <S%H776><s%>: the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days <S%H3117><s%> I will fulfill <S%H4390><s%>.

I will send <S%H7971><s%> my fear <S%H367><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and will destroy <S%H2000><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> to whom you shall come <S%H935><s%>, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%> turn their backs unto you <S%H6203><s%>.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> hornets <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you which shall drive out <S%H1644><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, from before you <S%H6440><s%>.

I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you in one <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>; lest the land <S%H776><s%> become desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and the animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> multiply against you <S%H7227><s%>.

By little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you until you be increased <S%H6509><s%>, and inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

And I will set <S%H7896><s%> your bounds <S%H1366><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> even unto the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and from the desert <S%H4057><s%> unto the River <S%H5104><s%>: for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%>; and you shall drive them out <S%H1644><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>.
You shall make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H430><s%>, nor with their gods.

They shall not live <S%H3427><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%>, lest they make you sin <S%H2398><s%> against me <S%H5647><s%>: for if you serve their gods <S%H430><s%>, it will surely be a snare unto you <S%H4170><s%>.
